comments:
The pde.build tests in I20070919-0010 failed while compiling a plug-in.  The failure appears to be caused by a corrupt jdk1.4.2_14\jre\lib\plugin_g.jar

Andrew,

I can't see this issue on the relevant test machine, the jar unzips properly without error.
I'm not sure what the problem is here, the tests all worked in I20070918-0010 and I assume the vm hasn't changed.  I guess we shall see what happens with I20070919-1300
This problem has not recurred and only occurred that one time.
